rescuecore2.components
Class AbstractSimulator<T extends WorldModel<? extends Entity>>

java.lang.Object
  rescuecore2.components.AbstractComponent<T>
      rescuecore2.components.AbstractSimulator<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The subclass of WorldModel that this simulator understands.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Simulator
Direct Known Subclasses:
SampleSimulator, StandardSimulator
public abstract class AbstractSimulator<T extends WorldModel<? extends Entity>>
extends AbstractComponent<T>
implements Simulator

Abstract base class for simulator implementations.

processImmediately

protected boolean processImmediately(Message msg)
Description copied from class: AbstractComponent
Process an incoming message immediately. If the message can be processed quickly then this method should do so and return true. If the message may take some time to process (e.g. if it is a sense message (for agents) or a command message (for simulators) then this method should return false and the message will be processed in a different thread via the AbstractComponent.processMessage(Message) method.

Overrides:
processImmediately in class AbstractComponent<T extends WorldModel<? extends Entity>>
Parameters:
msg - The incoming message.
Returns:
true If the message was processed immediately, false if it requires slower processing.
